verbose_text: We circumvented this problem with a twofold strategy : (1) we increased the expression levels of EGFR using a doxycycline inducible EGFR expression system; upon doxycycline treatment, we obtained EGFR surface levels in MEFs comparable with those detectable in HeLa cells (see XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY E); and (2) we stimulated the cells with high doses of EGF (30 ng/mL) because we showed (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY B) that in these cells, only the CME pathway is active.
